COMMUNITY GUIDELINES

These guidelines help ensure Socialite remains a safe, positive, and welcoming space for everyone.

Last updated: DECEMBER 2025

1. Our Community Values

At Socialite, we believe in creating a community where everyone feels welcome, safe, and respected. These guidelines are designed to foster positive interactions and protect all members of our community.

  • Respect: Treat others as you want to be treated
  • Authenticity: Be yourself and be honest
  • Safety: Help keep our community safe for everyone
  • Inclusivity: Welcome and support diversity

2. Prohibited Content

The following content is not allowed on Socialite:

2.1 Hate Speech and Discrimination

  • Content that attacks individuals or groups based on race, ethnicity, national origin, religion, sex, gender, sexual orientation, disability, or disease
  • Slurs, stereotypes, or content that promotes hatred
  • Content that denies well-documented historical events

2.2 Harassment and Bullying

  • Threats of violence or physical harm
  • Targeted harassment or repeated unwanted contact
  • Sharing private information without consent (doxxing)
  • Encouraging others to harass someone
  • Revenge content or non-consensual intimate imagery

2.3 Violence and Dangerous Activities

  • Graphic violence or gore
  • Content that promotes or glorifies violence
  • Threats of violence against individuals or groups
  • Content promoting dangerous activities or challenges

2.4 Sexual Content

  • Sexually explicit or pornographic content
  • Sexual solicitation
  • Non-consensual intimate imagery
  • Sexual content involving minors (zero tolerance)

2.5 Illegal Activities

  • Content promoting illegal activities
  • Sale of illegal goods or services
  • Content that facilitates fraud or scams
  • Intellectual property infringement

2.6 Misinformation

  • Deliberately false or misleading information
  • Health misinformation that could cause harm
  • Election or civic process misinformation
  • Manipulated media presented as authentic

3. Spam and Inauthentic Behavior

We prohibit:

  • Spam and repetitive posting
  • Fake accounts and impersonation
  • Artificial engagement (buying likes, followers, etc.)
  • Coordinated inauthentic behavior
  • Automated or scripted actions

4. Privacy and Safety

Respect others' privacy by:

  • Not sharing personal information without consent
  • Not posting photos or videos of others without permission
  • Not tracking or monitoring others' activity
  • Reporting suspicious or concerning behavior

5. Intellectual Property

Respect intellectual property rights. Only share content you have the right to share. This includes:

  • Copyrighted music, videos, and images
  • Trademarked logos and brands
  • Content from other users without permission

6. Enforcement

Violations of these guidelines may result in:

  • Content removal
  • Temporary account restriction
  • Permanent account suspension
  • Report to law enforcement (in serious cases)

We consider the severity and frequency of violations when determining consequences. First-time minor violations may receive a warning, while serious violations may result in immediate permanent suspension.

7. Reporting Violations

If you see content that violates these guidelines, please report it using the in-app reporting feature. You can also contact us directly at:

  • Email: support@socialite.world
  • In-app: Tap the three dots menu on any content and select "Report"

All reports are reviewed by our Trust & Safety team. We keep reporter information confidential.

8. Appeals

If you believe your content was removed or your account was restricted in error, you can submit an appeal through the app or by emailing support@socialite.world.

9. Updates to Guidelines

We may update these guidelines as our community evolves. We will notify users of significant changes through the app and on this page.

10. Questions?

If you have questions about these guidelines, please contact us at: support@socialite.world
